channel.title: Switching from 508 to 317
channel.description:
okay if i were to switch a server from 508 down to 317 what would i have to do server wise not client wise. change the packets ? change the interfaces,gfx displayed/loaded?
(do you have to change how the packets are loaded?) what else?

item.title: Switching from 508 to 317
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

You’d have to search the entire server for all instances of anything over the 317 protocol as well. Items, etc. It really is a lot of stuff. It’s a lot easier to upgrade than it is to downgrade.

Read full topic
